abstract: The economist Stephen D. King also writes horror stories, warnings that the Western world faces an era of slower growth, and that governments will be unable to keep all of the promises they have made.
snippet: The economist Stephen D. King also writes horror stories, warnings that the Western world faces an era of slower growth, and that governments will be unable to keep all of the promises they have made.
lead_paragraph: Stephen D. King, chief economist at HSBC, was paged at an airport a few years ago. When he showed up at the information desk, the obviously disappointed attendant said, “Oh, you’re not the Stephen King that writes books.”

abstract: Unlike the usual practice of staying mum at the annual Allen & Company media and technology conference in Idaho, Google executives used a news conference to promote their business.
snippet: Unlike the usual practice of staying mum at the annual Allen & Company media and technology conference in Idaho, Google executives used a news conference to promote their business.
lead_paragraph: SUN VALLEY, Idaho — It is a gathering where many executives make it a point to stay largely mum. But Google’s representatives at the Allen & Company media and technology conference here used their time to promote their business.

headline.main: Google Executives Discuss YouTube, the Phone Business and Taxes

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
